## **Tender Description**
This bid solicitation aims to satisfy the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission’s (the Client) requirement for providing falling prevention training under the Canadian Safeguards Support Program (CSSP) for a 3-year duration. The requirement is subject to no trade agreements. This strategic sourcing opportunity seeks one (1) contract supplier for the provision of fall prevention training services.

DBE, EEO, and TPO are not applicable for this project
